call_title: Looking to the Future | Armeanio and Kushti | Ergoversary 2025

topics.title: Global Economic Problems and Ergo's Mission
topics.summary: Discussion of global debt cycles, inflation, and declining economic freedom as motivation for building better money systems. Introduction to Ergo as an open source project exploring solutions for economic freedom and prosperity.

topics.title: ChainCash and Better Money Initiative Overview
topics.summary: Explanation of the better money initiative focusing on ChainCash as a foundation for blockchain-based digital free banking. Discussion of building trustless derivatives and algorithmic stablecoins to address real-world financial needs in underserved regions.

topics.title: Global Adoption and Real-World Use Cases
topics.summary: Discussion of partnerships with African nations, small cooperatives, and regions with hyperinflation or limited traditional finance access. Focus on providing better funding and trading solutions for international commerce.

topics.title: Sub-blocks Implementation and Node 6.0 Release
topics.summary: Update on Node 6.0 release for miner voting and sub-blocks implementation. Discussion of high-performance proof-of-work protocols and how sub-blocks improve efficiency while maintaining backwards compatibility through soft forks.

topics.title: Community Splits and Hard Fork Risks
topics.summary: Discussion of how hard forks can split communities, citing examples from NXT, Bitcoin block size wars, and potential future Bitcoin controversies. Emphasis on the importance of maintaining community cohesion through gradual updates.

topics.title: Merge-Mined Sidechains and Drive Chains Concept
topics.summary: Detailed discussion of merge-mined sidechains as a solution for increasing miner revenue and enabling innovation without touching main protocols. Comparison with Bitcoin drive chains and examples from Litecoin/Dogecoin merge mining.

topics.title: Double Merge-Mined Bitcoin-Ergo Sidechains
topics.summary: Technical explanation of proposed double merge-mined sidechains between Bitcoin and Ergo, enabling trustless DeFi for Bitcoin with minimal trust assumptions. Discussion of two-way pegs and potential revenue for both Bitcoin and Ergo miners.

topics.title: Privacy-Focused Sidechains and Dark DeFi
topics.summary: Discussion of privacy-oriented merge-mined sidechains inspired by Zephyr protocol, featuring private transfers, oracle pools, and dark DeFi capabilities with improved privacy features like FCMP from Monero.

topics.title: Cardano Partnership and Multi-Chain Validation
topics.summary: Brief discussion of potential Ergo-Cardano partner chains where blocks would be validated by both Ergo miners and Cardano validators, enabling trustless interoperability between the two networks.

topics.title: Sigma Chains and Hardware Utilization
topics.summary: Introduction of Sigma Chains concept for dedicated proof-of-work chains targeting different hardware classes. Discussion of utilizing untamed computing power from ASICs, GPUs, and outdated AI hardware while providing immediate liquidity through Rosen Bridge.

topics.title: Advanced Cryptography and Developer Experimentation
topics.summary: Discussion of how sidechains enable experimentation with advanced sigma protocols and cryptographic features that aren't easily accessible through other blockchain platforms like EVM, providing developers new capabilities for innovation.

topics.title: Fair Distribution vs Rugpull Economy
topics.summary: Critique of meme coin rugpulls and VC token dumps, contrasting with proof-of-work's natural fair distribution. Discussion of how merge-mined sidechains provide gradual, organic liquidity creation versus sudden token launches.

topics.title: Bitcoin's Original Ethos and Current State
topics.summary: Reflection on how Bitcoin's original ethos of fair distribution and permissionless participation remains powerful, despite narrative-driven projects that don't enhance actual freedom. Discussion of the forgotten principles of early digital cash systems.

topics.title: Development Timeline and Sub-blocks Deployment
topics.summary: Timeline update on sub-blocks implementation moving from DevNet to public testnet in July, and closing remarks about building better money systems to counter increasing global debt and surveillance.
